mil5.5.11:3.2_2: āḷāro kālāmo ācariyo me samāno antevāsiṁ maṁ samānaṁ attanā samasamaṁ ṭhapesi,
mil5.5.11:3.4_0: ‘na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati.
mil5.5.11:3.5_4: āḷāro kālāmo ācariyo me samāno antevāsiṁ maṁ samānaṁ attanā samasamaṁ ṭhapesī’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ,
mil5.5.11:3.7_2: āḷāro kālāmo ācariyo me samāno antevāsiṁ maṁ samānaṁ attanā samasamaṁ ṭhapesī’ti,
mil5.5.11:3.8_0: Sadevakasmiṁ lokasmiṁ, natthi me paṭipuggalo’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.5.11:3.9_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.5.11:6.2_2: āḷāro kālāmo ācariyo me samāno antevāsiṁ maṁ samānaṁ attanā samasamaṁ ṭhapesi,
mil5.5.11:7.1_0: Tañca pana vacanaṁ pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ācariyabhāvaṁ sandhāya bhāsitaṁ.
mil5.5.11:8.1_1: pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattassa sato ācariyā,
mil5.5.11:8.1_2: yehi anusiṭṭho bodhisatto tattha tattha divasaṁ vītināmesi.
mil5.5.11:8.3_0: Ye te, mahārāja, aṭṭha brāhmaṇā jātamatte bodhisatte lakkhaṇāni pariggaṇhiṁsu, seyyathidaṁ—
mil5.5.11:8.4_0: rāmo dhajo lakkhaṇo mantī yañño suyāmo subhojo sudattoti.
mil5.5.11:8.5_0: Te tassa sotthiṁ pavedayitvā rakkhākammaṁ akaṁsu, te ca paṭhamaṁ ācariyā.
mil5.5.11:9.1_1: bodhisattassa pitā suddhodano rājā yaṁ tena samayena abhijātaṁ udiccajātimantaṁ padakaṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ
mil5.5.11:9.1_2: chaḷaṅgavantaṁ sabbamittaṁ nāma brāhmaṇaṁ upanetvā sovaṇṇena bhiṅgārena udakaṁ oṇojetvā ‘imaṁ kumāraṁ
mil5.5.11:10.1_2: yassā vacanaṁ sutvā bodhisatto saṁviggo ubbiggo tasmiṁyeva khaṇe nekkhammaṁ nikkhamitvā pabbaji,
mil5.5.11:11.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, āḷāro kālāmo ākiñcaññāyatanassa parikammaṁ ācikkhi, ayaṁ catuttho ācariyo.
mil5.5.11:13.1_0: Ime kho, mahārāja, pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattassa sato pañca ācariyā.
mil5.5.11:13.2_0: Te ca pana ācariyā lokiye dhamme.
mil5.5.11:13.3_1: lokuttare dhamme sabbaññutañāṇappaṭivedhāya natthi tathāgatassa anuttaro anusāsako, sayambhū, mahārāja,
